hints.content: Which of the shapes also has $4$ sides and $4$ right angles?

This shape belongs in the group:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 5 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles. !

question.content:
The following shapes all belong to the same group.

 | | 
- | - | -
![A four-sided shape. The longest sides are labeled 15 centimeters each. The shortest sides are labeled 8 centimeters each. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/aaa6fb65570b855cbcfa3e89ece87c64387afce1) | ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 8 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/63ab2082e4d7ddbc66bc4d92044fe1e139e28549) | ![A four-sided shape. The top and bottom sides are labeled 12 centimeters. The left and right sides are labeled 6 centimeters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/18f244ac6a9f611e49d89d181a185e9a8a2f8e0f)

All of the shapes have $4$ sides and $4$ right angles.

**Which of the following shapes belongs in the group?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 7 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/93514dfe54d3cb4511c309007fda5b67212fb88a)
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 5 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5c76f5eb889be8f21de97eddffbb122e26e5c65c)
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 10 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f07d6af94d69e7dcd88f1c89d55b60adccdeeb11)

![A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 20 meters, the bottom side is labeled 17 meters, the left side is labeled 18 meters, and the right side is labeled 18 meters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/96fd7fd750c6d263b0e749dba93ed794289641da)
